synopsis.text:
Sanama Laboratory's Crash Gear, a popular street game, has captured the heart of Mahha Masaru, an enthusiastic fifth-grader who recently moved to a new town. Despite his passion for the game, Masaru lacks his own Crush Gear to participate in battles. However, fate intervenes when he stumbles upon a legendary Crush Gear resembling Kouya Marino's, which propels him into the world of Gear Fighters.

As Masaru embarks on his journey to become a skilled Gear Fighter, he encounters various individuals who share his love for the game, including Natsumi Maeda, a young girl, and Ginjirou Fujiwara, a Gear shop owner. He also crosses paths with the enigmatic Elite Gear organization, ZET, and Sanama Laboratory's promotional development group members like Akusawa Yuu.

With his newfound Crush Gear, Masaru embraces the thrill of competing in gear fights against friends and rivals alike. As he grows stronger and gains experience, he becomes determined to challenge powerful opponents, leaving a lasting impact on the Crash Gear community.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
